00001 #include <ip.h>

00003 void
00004 ip_upstream(ip_state * state, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00005 {
00006         tw_event        *e;
00007 
00008         state->stats->s_avg_ttl += (g_rn_ttl - msg->ttl);
00009         state->stats->s_max_ttl = max(state->stats->s_max_ttl, g_rn_ttl - msg->ttl);
00010         state->stats->s_ncomplete++;
00011         msg->size -= g_ip_header;
00012 
00013         e = rn_event_new(lp->gid, 0.0, lp, UPSTREAM, msg->size);
00014         rn_event_send(e);
00015 
00016 #if VERIFY_IP
00017                 printf("%lld IP: sent UP src %lld, dst %lld, ts %lf \n", 
00018                         lp->id, msg->src, msg->dst, tw_now(lp));
00019 #endif
00020 }

00022 void
00023 ip_rc_upstream(ip_state * state, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00024 {
00025         msg->size += g_ip_header;
00026         state->stats->s_ncomplete--;
00027                 
00028         // not correct, must be state-saved
00029         state->stats->s_max_ttl = max(state->stats->s_max_ttl, g_rn_ttl - msg->ttl);
00030 
00031         state->stats->s_avg_ttl -= (g_rn_ttl - msg->ttl);
00032 }
